 Introduce a left conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Nov-2013.)
statement:
anbi.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
anbi2i $p |- ( ( ch /\ ph ) <-> ( ch /\ ps ) ) $.
